text: to jo maal khuda ne apane rasool ko dehaat vaalon se be lade dilavaaya hai vah khaas khuda aur usake rasool aur (rasool ke) qaraabatadaaron aur yateemon aur mohataajon aur paradesiyon ka hai taaki jo log tumamen se daulatamand hain hir phir kar daulat unheen mein na rahe, haan jo tumako rasool den den vah le liya karo aur jisase mana karen usase baaz raho aur khuda se darate raho beshak khuda sakht azaab dene vaala hai
